rukus.text: Conglin de jumin, ceng fouren shizhe
Dangri, shu a bo ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne
Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe
Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo
Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi gui zhong shijie de zhu fudan
Nimen yingdang yong zu liang de sheng dou, buyao kekou
Nimen yingdang yi gongping de cheng cheng wu
Nimen buyao kekou taren suo ying de de caiwu. Nimen buyao zai difang shang weifeizuodai, bainong shifei
Nimen yingdang jingwei an la, ta chuangzao nimen he gulao de shidai.”
Tamen shuo:“Ni zhishi yige bei guhuo de ren
Ni zhishi yige xiang women yiyang de fanren. Women dique renwei ni shi yige shuohuang de
Ni shi tian yikuai kuai di luo zai women de tou shang ba, ruguo ni shi chengshi de.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu shi zui zhidao nimen de xingwei de.”
Tamen fouren ta. Tamen jiu zaoshou yinying zhi ri de xingfa. Na que shi zhongda ri de xingfa
Ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban shi bu xindao de
Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
